name: RoomFlux
description:
(Submission to the 2021 Chaos Game Jam)

A short and experimental puzzle game with stylized graphics.  You'll buttons and gimmicks to flip or shifts part of your world around to help you get to the flag, but with a unique inter-dimensional twist.

*most things should be able to be picked up, but they might glitch away from you if you're too far away when you try to grab them
